requiredTexts: Crowdtap 101: The Basics
Learn how to answer surveys, earn rewards, and get contest updates!
Financial Habits and Spending Priorities

This is a short survey to gather insights about people's financial habits and spending priorities. There are no right or wrong answers — share your honest experience. It should only take 2-3 minutes to complete.
Spring Fling
You found one of your "Spring Fling" surveys. Good job!!
Questions about health & business!
We’d like to ask a few questions to better understand your experiences.
All about your health!
Please answer a few questions about your health and care you are interested in receiving.
Shopping & beverage survey!
This survey may take you 10 minutes of your time. Please answer honestly!
Some questions about you!
We have a few questions about you. There are no right or wrong answers so please answer honestly. Thank you for your time!
Quick Survey
Jump into this quick survey and tell us about a financial service you may or may not use. There are no “right” or “wrong” answers, so please answer HONESTLY. Thanks in advance for participating!

text: So what can this brand tell you?
requiredTexts: So what can this brand tell you?
We are hoping to gain feedback on some claims for a new product. There are no right or wrong answers, so please be honest. Thank you for your time!
